00075 void GLCanvas::connectEvents()
00076 {
00077         // Connect-methods to connect different Events with functions
00078         Connect(wxEVT_MIDDLE_DOWN, (wxObjectEventFunction)&GLCanvas::OnMMouseDown);
00079         Connect(wxEVT_MIDDLE_UP, (wxObjectEventFunction)&GLCanvas::OnMMouseUp);
00080         Connect(wxEVT_RIGHT_DOWN, (wxObjectEventFunction)&GLCanvas::OnRMouseDown);
00081         Connect(wxEVT_RIGHT_UP, (wxObjectEventFunction)&GLCanvas::OnRMouseUp);
00082         Connect(wxEVT_LEFT_DOWN, (wxObjectEventFunction)&GLCanvas::OnLMouseDown);
00083         Connect(wxEVT_LEFT_UP, (wxObjectEventFunction)&GLCanvas::OnLMouseUp);
00084         Connect(wxEVT_LEAVE_WINDOW, (wxObjectEventFunction)&GLCanvas::OnLeaveWindow);
00085         Connect(wxEVT_ENTER_WINDOW, (wxObjectEventFunction)&GLCanvas::OnEnterWindow);
00086         Connect(wxEVT_SIZE, (wxObjectEventFunction)&GLCanvas::OnResize);
00087         Connect(wxEVT_PAINT,(wxObjectEventFunction)&GLCanvas::OnPaint);
00088         Connect(wxEVT_LEFT_DCLICK, (wxObjectEventFunction)&GLCanvas::OnLMouseDblClick);
00089 }

00099         Connect(wxEVT_MIDDLE_UP, (wxObjectEventFunction)&GLCanvas::OnMMouseUp);
00100         Connect(wxEVT_RIGHT_DOWN, (wxObjectEventFunction)&GLCanvas::OnRMouseDown);
00101         Connect(wxEVT_RIGHT_UP, (wxObjectEventFunction)&GLCanvas::OnRMouseUp);
00102         Connect(wxEVT_LEFT_DOWN, (wxObjectEventFunction)&GLCanvas::OnLMouseDown);
00103         Connect(wxEVT_LEFT_UP, (wxObjectEventFunction)&GLCanvas::OnLMouseUp);
00104         Connect(wxEVT_LEAVE_WINDOW, (wxObjectEventFunction)&GLCanvas::OnLeaveWindow);
00105         Connect(wxEVT_LEFT_DCLICK, (wxObjectEventFunction)&GLCanvas::OnLMouseDblClick);
00106         Disconnect(wxEVT_ENTER_WINDOW, (wxObjectEventFunction)&GLCanvas::OnEnterWindow);
00107 }

00127 void GLCanvas::setMatrix()
00128 {
00129         GetClientSize(&m_window_x, &m_window_y);
00130         float aspect = (float)m_window_x/(float)m_window_y;
00131 
00132         glMatrixMode(GL_PROJECTION);
00133         glLoadIdentity();
00134 
00135         gluPerspective(GLU_PERSPECTIVE, aspect, ZNEAR, ZFAR);
00136         glViewport(0, 0, m_window_x, m_window_y);
00137 
00138         glMatrixMode(GL_MODELVIEW);
00139         glLoadIdentity();
00140 }

00142 void GLCanvas::initLights()
00143 {
00144         glLightfv(GL_LIGHT0, GL_DIFFUSE, light_diffuse);
00145         glLightfv(GL_LIGHT0, GL_AMBIENT, light_ambient);
00146         glLightfv(GL_LIGHT0, GL_SPECULAR, light_specular);
00147         glLightfv(GL_LIGHT0, GL_POSITION, light_position);
00148 
00149         glLightModelfv(GL_LIGHT_MODEL_AMBIENT, light_ambient);
00150         glLightModeli(GL_LIGHT_MODEL_TWO_SIDE, 1);
00151 
00152         glEnable(GL_LIGHTING);
00153         glEnable(GL_LIGHT0);
00154 
00155         glClearColor(0.2, 0.2, 0.2, 1.0);
00156 }

00162 void GLCanvas::initGL()
00163 {
00164         //define light source
00165         light_ambient[0] = 0.2;
00166         light_ambient[1] = 0.2;
00167         light_ambient[2] = 0.2;
00168         light_ambient[3] = 0.0;
00169 
00170         light_diffuse[0] = 1.0;
00171         light_diffuse[1] = 1.0;
00172         light_diffuse[2] = 1.0;
00173         light_diffuse[3] = 0.0;
00174 
00175         light_specular[0] = 0.1;
00176         light_specular[1] = 0.1;
00177         light_specular[2] = 0.1;
00178         light_specular[3] = 0.0;
00179 
00180         //define light position 1
00181         light_position[0] = 30.0;
00182         light_position[1] = 60.0;
00183         light_position[2] = 20.0;
00184         light_position[3] = 1.0;
00185 
00186         //define shadow color
00187         shadow_color[0] = 0.2;
00188         shadow_color[1] = 0.2;
00189         shadow_color[2] = 0.2;
00190         shadow_color[3] = 0.6;
00191 
00192         //normal of floor
00193         floor_plane[0] = 0.0;
00194         floor_plane[1] = 1.0;
00195         floor_plane[2] = 0.0;
00196         floor_plane[3] = 0.0;
00197 
00198         //calculate shadow matrix on init
00199         SetShadowMatrix(floor_shadow,floor_plane,light_position);
00200 
00201         //set active canvas
00202         SetCurrent();
00203 
00204         glShadeModel(GL_SMOOTH);
00205 
00206         //glFrontFace(GL_CCW);
00207         //glCullFace(GL_BACK);
00208 
00209         glDepthFunc(GL_LEQUAL);
00210 
00211         glBlendFunc(GL_ONE_MINUS_SRC_ALPHA,GL_SRC_ALPHA);
00212         //glBlendFunc(GL_SRC_ALPHA, GL_ONE_MINUS_SRC_ALPHA);
00213         //glBlendFunc(GL_DST_COLOR, GL_SRC_COLOR);
00214 
00215         glEnable(GL_BLEND);
00216         glEnable(GL_DEPTH_TEST);
00217         glEnable(GL_LINE_SMOOTH);
00218         glEnable(GL_POLYGON_SMOOTH);
00219         //glEnable(GL_CULL_FACE);
00220         glEnable(GL_STENCIL_TEST);
00221         //glEnable(GL_POLYGON_OFFSET_LINE);
00222         //glEnable(GL_POINT_SMOOTH);
00223 
00224         glHint(GL_PERSPECTIVE_CORRECTION_HINT, GL_NICEST);
00225         glHint(GL_LINE_SMOOTH_HINT, GL_NICEST);
00226         glHint(GL_POLYGON_SMOOTH_HINT, GL_NICEST);
00227 
00228         loadFloorTexture();
00229 
00230         glLineWidth(10.0f);
00231         glClearDepth(1.0f);
00232 
00233         glPolygonMode(GL_FRONT_AND_BACK, GL_FILL);
00234 
00235         glEnable(GL_NORMALIZE);
00236 }

00238 void GLCanvas::drawBaseFloor(float fCenterX, float fCenterY, float fCenterZ, int fSize)
00239 {
00240         //is valid display list, call list
00241         if (glIsList(m_floor_DL))
00242         {
00243                 glCallList(m_floor_DL);
00244                 return;
00245         }
00246 
00247         float FloorColor[4] = { 0.9f, 0.9f, 0.9f, 0.0f };
00248 
00249         //create new display list for floor
00250         m_floor_DL = glGenLists(1);
00251 
00252         glNewList(m_floor_DL,GL_COMPILE);
00253         {
00254                 glEnable(GL_TEXTURE_2D);
00255                 glTexEnvf(GL_TEXTURE_ENV, GL_TEXTURE_ENV_MODE, GL_MODULATE);
00256 
00257                 glMaterialfv(GL_FRONT, GL_SPECULAR, FloorColor);
00258                 glMaterialfv(GL_FRONT, GL_AMBIENT_AND_DIFFUSE, FloorColor);
00259                 glMaterialfv(GL_FRONT, GL_EMISSION, FloorColor);
00260                 glMaterialf(GL_FRONT, GL_SHININESS, 50.0);
00261 
00262                 glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, FloorTexture);
00263 
00264                 glBegin(GL_QUADS);
00265 
00266                 //set normal
00267                 glNormal3f(0.0, 1.0, 0.0);
00268 
00269                 //set starting edge half of size from center
00270                 float s = fSize/2;
00271 
00272                 //calculate start and end
00273                 int start = -(int)s;
00274                 int end   = (int)s;
00275 
00276                 //draw fSize quads in x-axis
00277                 for (GLint i = start; i < end; i++)
00278                 {
00279                         //draw fSize quads in z-axis
00280                         for (GLint j = start; j < end; j++)
00281                         {
00282                                 glTexCoord2f(0.0,0.0);
00283                                 glVertex3f(j+fCenterX,fCenterY,i+fCenterZ);
00284                                 glTexCoord2f(0.0,1.0);
00285                                 glVertex3f(j+fCenterX,fCenterY,i+fCenterZ+1.0f);
00286                                 glTexCoord2f(1.0,1.0);
00287                                 glVertex3f(j+fCenterX+1.0f,fCenterY,i+fCenterZ+1.0f);
00288                                 glTexCoord2f(1.0,0.0);
00289                                 glVertex3f(j+fCenterX+1.0f,fCenterY,i+fCenterZ);
00290                         }
00291                 }
00292                 glEnd();
00293 
00294                 glDisable(GL_TEXTURE_2D);
00295         }
00296         glEndList();
00297         //finish display list...
00298 }
00299 
00300 void GLCanvas::loadFloorTexture()
00301 {
00302         wxImage image(grid_24bit_rgb_xpm);
00303         glGenTextures(1, &FloorTexture);
00304         glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, FloorTexture);
00305         glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_WRAP_S, GL_CLAMP);
00306         glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_WRAP_T, GL_CLAMP);
00307         glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MAG_FILTER, GL_LINEAR);
00308         glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MIN_FILTER, GL_LINEAR_MIPMAP_LINEAR);
00309         gluBuild2DMipmaps(GL_TEXTURE_2D, 3, image.GetWidth(), image.GetHeight(), GL_RGB, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, image.GetData());
00310 }
00311 
00312 void GLCanvas::SetShadowMatrix(float shadowMat[4][4], float groundplane[4], float lightpos[4])
00313 {
00314         float dot = groundplane[X]*lightpos[X] + groundplane[Y]*lightpos[Y] + groundplane[Z]*lightpos[Z] + groundplane[W]*lightpos[W];
00315         shadowMat[X][0] = dot - lightpos[X] * groundplane[X];
00316         shadowMat[Y][0] = 0.f - lightpos[X] * groundplane[Y];
00317         shadowMat[Z][0] = 0.f - lightpos[X] * groundplane[Z];
00318         shadowMat[W][0] = 0.f - lightpos[X] * groundplane[W];
00319         shadowMat[X][1] = 0.f - lightpos[Y] * groundplane[X];
00320         shadowMat[Y][1] = dot - lightpos[Y] * groundplane[Y];
00321         shadowMat[Z][1] = 0.f - lightpos[Y] * groundplane[Z];
00322         shadowMat[W][1] = 0.f - lightpos[Y] * groundplane[W];
00323         shadowMat[X][2] = 0.f - lightpos[Z] * groundplane[X];
00324         shadowMat[Y][2] = 0.f - lightpos[Z] * groundplane[Y];
00325         shadowMat[Z][2] = dot - lightpos[Z] * groundplane[Z];
00326         shadowMat[W][2] = 0.f - lightpos[Z] * groundplane[W];
00327         shadowMat[X][3] = 0.f - lightpos[W] * groundplane[X];
00328         shadowMat[Y][3] = 0.f - lightpos[W] * groundplane[Y];
00329         shadowMat[Z][3] = 0.f - lightpos[W] * groundplane[Z];
00330         shadowMat[W][3] = dot - lightpos[W] * groundplane[W];
00331 
00332 }
00333 
00334 void GLCanvas::loadShadowMatrix()
00335 {
00336         glMultMatrixf((float *) floor_shadow);
00337 }

00339 void GLCanvas::shadowColorOn()
00340 {
00341         glColor4f(shadow_color[0],shadow_color[1],shadow_color[2],shadow_color[3]);
00342         glDisable(GL_TEXTURE_2D);
00343         glDisable(GL_LIGHTING);
00344         glDisable(GL_DEPTH_TEST);
00345         glEnable(GL_BLEND);
00346         glStencilOp(GL_KEEP, GL_KEEP, GL_INCR);
00347         //glCullFace(GL_FRONT);
00348 }

00350 void GLCanvas::shadowColorOff()

00353         glDisable(GL_STENCIL_TEST);
00354         glEnable(GL_DEPTH_TEST);
00355         glEnable(GL_LIGHTING);
00356         //glCullFace(GL_BACK);
00357 }

00359 void GLCanvas::endPixelBuffer()
00360 {
00361         glColorMask(GL_TRUE, GL_TRUE, GL_TRUE, GL_TRUE);
00362         glDepthMask(GL_TRUE);
00363         glStencilFunc(GL_EQUAL, 1, 0xFFFFFFFF);
00364         glStencilOp(GL_KEEP, GL_KEEP, GL_KEEP);
00365 }

00371 void GLCanvas::prepareDraw()
00372 {
00373         SetCurrent();
00374         glClear(GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT | GL_DEPTH_BUFFER_BIT | GL_STENCIL_BUFFER_BIT);
00375         glLoadIdentity();
00376 }
00377 
00378 void GLCanvas::endDraw()
00379 {
00380         glFlush();
00381         SwapBuffers();
00382 }
00383 
00384 void GLCanvas::preparePixelBuffer()
00385 {
00386         glColorMask(GL_FALSE, GL_FALSE, GL_FALSE, GL_FALSE);
00387         glDepthMask(GL_FALSE);
00388         glEnable(GL_STENCIL_TEST);
00389         glStencilFunc(GL_ALWAYS, 1, 0xFFFFFFFF);
00390         glStencilOp(GL_REPLACE, GL_REPLACE, GL_REPLACE);
00391 }

00401 Assembly* GLCanvas::selection(Assembly* rootAssembly, GLCamera* camera, int mouse_x, int mouse_y)
00402 {
00403         SetCurrent();
00404         // Set Up A Selection Buffer
00405         GLuint  buffer[512];
00406         // The Number Of Objects That We Selected
00407         GLint   hits;
00408 
00409         // The Size Of The Viewport. [0] Is <x>, [1] Is <y>, [2] Is <length>, [3] Is <width>
00410         GLint   viewport[4];
00411 
00412         // This Sets The Array <viewport> To The Size And Location Of The Screen Relative To The Window
00413         glGetIntegerv(GL_VIEWPORT, viewport);
00414         // Tell OpenGL To Use Our Array For Selection
00415         glSelectBuffer(512, buffer);
00416 
00417         // Puts OpenGL In Selection Mode. Nothing Will Be Drawn.  Object ID's and Extents Are Stored In The Buffer.
00418         glRenderMode(GL_SELECT);
00419 
00420         // Initializes The Name Stack
00421         glInitNames();
00422         // Push 0 (At Least One Entry) Onto The Stack
00423         glPushName(0);
00424 
00425         glMatrixMode(GL_PROJECTION);
00426         glPushMatrix();
00427         {
00428                 glLoadIdentity();
00429 
00430                 // This Creates A Matrix That Will Zoom Up To A Small Portion Of The Screen, Where The Mouse Is.
00431                 gluPickMatrix((GLdouble) mouse_x, (GLdouble)(viewport[3]-mouse_y), 1.0f, 1.0f, viewport);
00432 
00433                 // Apply The Perspective Matrix
00434                 setPerspective();
00435                 glMatrixMode(GL_MODELVIEW);
00436 
00437                 // Reset The Modelview Matrix
00438                 glLoadIdentity();
00439 
00440                 //prepareDraw();
00441                 camera->render();
00442 
00443                 rootAssembly->draw();
00444 
00445                 // Select The Projection Matrix
00446                 glMatrixMode(GL_PROJECTION);
00447         }
00448         glPopMatrix();
00449         glPopName();
00450         glMatrixMode(GL_MODELVIEW);
00451         // Switch To Render Mode, Find Out How Many Objects Were Drawn Where The Mouse Was
00452         hits=glRenderMode(GL_RENDER);
00453 
00454         if (hits > 0)
00455         {
00456                 // Make Our Selection The First Object
00457                 int     choose = buffer[3];
00458                 // Store How Far Away It Is
00459                 int depth = buffer[1];
00460 
00461                 // Loop Through All The Detected Hits
00462                 for (int loop = 1; loop < hits; loop++)
00463                 {
00464                         // If This Object Is Closer To Us Than The One We Have Selected
00465                         if (buffer[loop*4+1] < GLuint(depth))
00466                         {
00467                                 // Select The Closer Object
00468                                 choose = buffer[loop*4+3];
00469                                 // Store How Far Away It Is
00470                                 depth = buffer[loop*4+1];
00471                         }
00472                 }
00473 
00474                 //if choose > 0, an object was hit
00475                 if (choose > 0)
00476                 {
00477                         //return pointer to master of assembly
00478                         Assembly* a = (Assembly*)choose;
00479                         return a->getMaster();
00480                 }
00481         }
00482         return NULL;
00483 }
00484 
00490 void GLCanvas::OnLMouseDown(wxMouseEvent& event)
00491 {
00492         SetFocus();
00493         Connect(wxEVT_MOUSEWHEEL, (wxObjectEventFunction)&GLCanvas::OnMouseWheel);
00494 
00495         Vertex* glcoords = new Vertex[2];
00496         getGLDim(event.GetX(), event.GetY(), glcoords);
00497 
00498         // send Event to handle Mouse
00499         GLNotifyEvent myevent(wxEVT_COMMAND_GL_NOTIFY);
00500         myevent.setMouseEvent(event);
00501         myevent.setCanvasID(getCanvasID());
00502         myevent.SetEventObject(this);
00503         myevent.SetInt((int)this);
00504         myevent.setWindowSize(m_window_x, m_window_y);
00505         myevent.setWorldSize(glcoords);
00506         GetEventHandler()->ProcessEvent(myevent);
00507 
00508         Connect(wxEVT_MOTION, (wxObjectEventFunction)&GLCanvas::OnMouseMove);
00509         delete[] glcoords;
00510 }
00511

00682 void GLCanvas::OnEnterWindow(wxMouseEvent& event)
00683 {
00684         reconnectEvents();
00685 
00686         // send Event to handle Mouse
00687         GLNotifyEvent myevent(wxEVT_COMMAND_GL_NOTIFY);
00688         myevent.setMouseEvent(event);
00689         myevent.setCanvasID(getCanvasID());
00690         myevent.SetEventObject(this);
00691         GetEventHandler()->ProcessEvent(myevent);
00692 }
00693 
00699 void GLCanvas::OnResize(wxSizeEvent& WXUNUSED(event))
00700 {
00701         //get canvas-size
00702         GetClientSize(&m_window_x, &m_window_y);
00703 
00704         // Adjust Viewport, ...
00705         reshape();
00706 }
00707 
00712 void GLCanvas::reshape()
00713 {
00714         // set current GL-Frame
00715         SetCurrent();
00716 
00717         // set viewport with resolution
00718         glViewport(0, 0, (GLint) m_window_x, (GLint) m_window_y);
00719 
00720         // Load and Reset Modelview
00721         glMatrixMode(GL_PROJECTION);
00722         glLoadIdentity();
00723         setPerspective();
00724 
00725         // Load and Reset Modelview
00726         glMatrixMode(GL_MODELVIEW);
00727         glLoadIdentity();
00728 }
00729 
00734 void GLCanvas::OnPaint(wxPaintEvent& event)
00735 {
00736         // Event for Redrawing the Canvases
00737         NotifyEvent myevent(wxEVT_COMMAND_GNR_NOTIFY);
00738         myevent.setGNREventType(GLREFRESH);
00739         myevent.SetEventObject(this);
00740         GetEventHandler()->ProcessEvent(myevent);
00741         event.Skip();
00742 }
00743 /*
00744 // Convert Mouse-Coordinates to GL-Coordinates
00745 void GLCanvas::getGLPos(int x, int y, Vertex* glcoords) {
00746         SetCurrent();
00747         glPushMatrix();
00748 
00749         GLdouble modelview[16], projection[16];
00750         GLint viewport[4];
00751         float z;
00752         double xpos, ypos, zpos;
00753 
00754         glGetDoublev(GL_MODELVIEW_MATRIX, modelview);       //get the modelview matrix
00755         glGetDoublev(GL_PROJECTION_MATRIX, projection);     //get the projection matrix
00756         glGetIntegerv(GL_VIEWPORT, viewport);               //get the viewport
00757 
00758         //Read the window z co-ordinate (the z value on that point in unit cube)
00759         glReadPixels((int)x, (int)(viewport[3]-y), 1, 1, GL_DEPTH_COMPONENT, GL_FLOAT, &z);
00760 
00761         //Unproject the window co-ordinates to find the world co-ordinates.
00762         gluUnProject(x, viewport[3]-y, z, modelview, projection, viewport, &xpos, &ypos, &zpos);
00763 
00764         glPopMatrix();
00765 
00766         // return world coordinates
00767         glcoords->setX(xpos);
00768         glcoords->setY(ypos);
00769         glcoords->setZ(zpos);
00770 }
00771 */
00772 // Convert Mouse-Coordinates to GL-Coordinates
00773 void GLCanvas::getGLDim(int x, int y, Vertex* glcoords)
00774 {
00775         SetCurrent();
00776         glPushMatrix();
00777 
00778         GLdouble modelview[16], projection[16];
00779         GLint viewport[4];
00780         float z;
00781         double xpos, ypos, zpos;
00782 
00783         glGetDoublev(GL_MODELVIEW_MATRIX, modelview);       //get the modelview matrix
00784         glGetDoublev(GL_PROJECTION_MATRIX, projection);     //get the projection matrix
00785         glGetIntegerv(GL_VIEWPORT, viewport);               //get the viewport
00786 
00787         //Read the window z co-ordinate (the z value on that point in unit cube)
00788         glReadPixels((int)x, (int)(viewport[3]-y), 1, 1, GL_DEPTH_COMPONENT, GL_FLOAT, &z);
00789 
00790         //Unproject the window co-ordinates to find the world co-ordinates.
00791         gluUnProject(0, 0, z, modelview, projection, viewport, &xpos, &ypos, &zpos);
00792 
00793         glcoords[0].setX(xpos);
00794         glcoords[0].setY(ypos);
00795         glcoords[0].setZ(zpos);
00796 
00797         //Unproject the window co-ordinates to find the world co-ordinates.
00798         gluUnProject(m_window_x, m_window_y, z, modelview, projection, viewport, &xpos, &ypos, &zpos);
00799 
00800         glcoords[1].setX(xpos);
00801         glcoords[1].setY(ypos);
00802         glcoords[1].setZ(zpos);
00803 
00804         glPopMatrix();
00805 }
00806 
00811 void GLCanvas::setActive()
00812 {
00813         SetCurrent();
00814 }
